text: The 1998 Christchurch mayoral election was part of the New Zealand local elections of that year. Garry Moore of the centre-left Christchurch 2021 ticket was elected over thirteen other candidates, and replaced Vicki Buck as Mayor. ==Results== The final results were as followshttp://archived.ccc.govt.nz/archived/1998/elections/Results/candidatesMayor.asp ==References== Category:Mayoral elections in Christchurch Category:1998 elections in New Zealand Category:Politics of Christchurch Category:October 1998 events in Oceania Category:1990s in Christchurch
title: 1998 Christchurch mayoral election
